scenario.title: Sanrio Characters Collection (Extended)
scenario.description: An extended list of Sanrio characters with images sourced from the Hello Kitty Fandom Wiki.

characters.name: Badtz-Maru
characters.description: A mischievous little penguin with a spiky hairdo and a bit of an attitude.

characters.name: Gudetama
characters.description: A lazy egg with a distinct lack of motivation and a love for lounging around.

characters.name: Charmmy Kitty
characters.description: Hello Kitty's pet cat, who is as sweet and well-mannered as her owner.

characters.name: Chococat
characters.description: A curious black cat with a love for technology and a keen sense of curiosity.

characters.name: Cinnamoroll
characters.description: A shy but friendly puppy with long ears that help him fly.

characters.name: Dear Daniel
characters.description: Hello Kitty’s childhood friend and kind-hearted companion from London.

characters.name: Hello Kitty
characters.description: A cheerful and kind-hearted girl who loves baking cookies and making new friends.

characters.name: Ruby (Jewelpet)
characters.description: A cheerful and energetic white rabbit Jewelpet who specializes in magic.

characters.name: Keroppi
characters.description: An energetic frog who loves adventure and playing games with friends.

characters.name: Kuromi
characters.description: A punky girl with a mischievous personality and a black jester's hat.

characters.name: Mimmy
characters.description: Hello Kitty’s twin sister who wears a yellow bow.

characters.name: My Melody
characters.description: A sweet-natured girl who always wears a red or pink hood that covers her ears.

characters.name: Pochacco
characters.description: A sporty and playful dog who loves basketball and going on walks.

characters.name: Pompompurin
characters.description: A laid-back golden retriever who loves wearing his brown beret and eating pudding.

characters.name: Mocha
characters.description: The stylish and caring leader of the Cinnamoangels, known for her fashionable taste and charm.
